english.segment1: Here I satand. My heart is crying ou for You. I will wait. I will love
english.segment2: I look to You. In the sanctuary. Drinking deep from Your Holy fourtain
english.segment3: You've Captured my heart again. and I need You more. Than the morning needs the light
english.segment4: You've captured my heart again. For I know that I. I can't live without Your love
english.segment5: Fill me now. With the breath of Heaven. Beholding You I am free
english.segment6: You and I. We're meant to be together. Forever Yours. In Your Holy presence
english.segment7: You've captured my heart again. And I need You more. The the heavens need to sing
english.segment8: You've captured my heart again. For I know that I. I can't live without Your love
english.segment9: There's none beside You, None beside You, There's none before You. Beside You. There's no other like You, my God
english.segment10: And I need You more. The the oceans need the rain. You've captured my heart again. And I know that. I can't live without Your love
english.segment11: You've captured my heart again. And I need You more. The the winter need a song. You've captured my heart again. For I know that I. I can't live withou Your love.
